title: Add footer button after the letter that plays a video on click

requirements.text: Add a footer section directly after the apology letter content (after the current closing/signature area) that includes a short line telling Radhika that you are not angry and asking her to click the button.

quotes: Add a button on footer after ending the letter mai gussa nhi hu and told her to click on this and when she click on it play the attached video

acceptanceCriteria: A new footer area is visible at the end of the letter card (below the existing 'Forever Yours ðŸ’•' sign-off).
The footer displays user-facing text in English (e.g., 'I'm not angry. Click the button below.').
The footer content is responsive and looks correct on mobile and desktop without causing overflow or layout shifts.

requirements.text: Add a prominent button in that footer section; when clicked, it must play the provided/attached video (served as a local static asset from the frontend) without navigating away from the page.

quotes: when she click on it play the attached video

acceptanceCriteria: A button is displayed in the new footer section and is clearly tappable on mobile.
Clicking/tapping the button opens an in-page video player (modal/dialog or inline) and starts playback (or shows controls with autoplay attempt).
The video file is loaded from the frontend as a static asset (not fetched through the backend).
User can pause/close the video player and return to the letter view without a page reload.

requirements.text: Ensure the new footer message + button + video player styling matches the existing cute romantic theme (warm pastel palette) and does not introduce any 'built by' credit or branding.
acceptanceCriteria: The new UI elements visually match the existing theme (colors/typography/rounded corners/shadows).
No footer credit or 'built by' branding is added.
All new elements meet existing responsiveness expectations (usable on small screens).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for playing a static video.
nonGoals: Adding authentication-gated access to the video.
Adding third-party video hosting or external embeds.
